Any reliance on the material on this site is at your own risk.

This service we provide may contain certain information, necessarily, is not current or may have expired due to airlines or hotel policies and is provided solely for visa purposes only and not for the actual travel. Visa Reservation Services LLC, is not responsible for any medical claims on damages, accidents or deaths during travel. It is Customer’s or User’s responsibility to validate information present in the documents we provide. All insurance related questions, claims, concerns or issues should be directly dealt with the insurance provider or the agent provided in the visa letter.
